lead_paragraph: For 58 minutes Thursday, a scoreless tie persisted at Amalie Arena, and then with 1:43 left, the Tampa Bay Lightning caught a loose puck behind the net as Detroit Red Wings goalie Petr Mrazek went back to clear it.

headline.print_headline: Lightning Strike to Dump Red Wings From Playoffs
headline.main: Lightning Strike to Dump Red Wings From Playoffs
